mapper.select: select m.name as name,type,averageScore as score,last,c.name as cinema_name, c.address as cinema_address,hall,date,startAt as start,endAt as end, bPrice as noumi_price,tPrice as taopiaopiao_price,yPrice as yupiaoer_price from finalSession s,finalMovie m,finalCinema c where s.movieId=m.id and s.cinemaId=c.id and m.name=#{0}
select * from finalMovie where name like "%"#{0}"%"
select * from finalCinema where id in (select c.id from finalCinema c, finalSession s where c.id=s.cinemaId and s.movieId=#{0})
select * from finalSession where movieId=#{0} and cinemaId=#{1}
